chapter.text: nun. pen-eul dugo maengseko, geuligo geudeul(salamdeul)i giloghaneun geos-eul dugo maengseko
geudae junim-ui eunchong-e uihae geudae(muhammadeu)neun michin jaga anila
jinsillo geudaeegeneun kkeunh-iji anhneun bosang-i issnola
geuligo jinsillo geudaeneun gogyeolhan pumseong-eul jinyeossdoda
geuleoni geudaeneun bol geos-imyeo geudeuldo bol geos-ila
geudaedeul jung nuga siheom badgo issneun jainji (bol geos-ila)

sillo geudaeui junim geubunkkeseoneun nuga geubun-ui gil-eul beos-eona banghwanghaneunji gajang jal algo gyesin bun-imyeo geubunkkeseoneun nuga indoui gil-eul geodneun jadeul-inji gajang jal algo gyesin bun-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun jinlileul bujeonghaneun jadeul-eul ttaleuji malla
geudeul-eun geudaega (geudeul-eul) nageus-i daehayeo geudeuldo (geudaeleul) nageus-i daehagil galmanghadeola
geuligo geudaeneun maengseleul nambalhaneun bicheonhan eotteon nugudo ttaleuji malla
(geuneun) heomdam-eul ilsamgo dwis-soli hamyeo dol-adanineun jala
(geuneun) jib-yohi seon(seon)eul maggo jeog-uijeog-eulo haengdonghaneun joejisneun jala
ppunman anila (geuneun) moseub-i hyung-aghago taesaeng-i mohohan jala
geuneun jaesangwa jason-eul soyuhaessdaneun iyulo
geuege naui jingpyoga nangsongdoel ttae geuneun “(igeos-eun) yesnal salamdeul-ui seolhwa” lago malhadeola
naneun geuui ko wie pyosileul saegil geos-ila

sillo naneun geudeul-eul siheomhayeoss-euni machi jeong-won-ui soyujadeul-eul siheomhan geosgwa gatnola : geudeul-eun, achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae jeongnyeongko geugeos(yeolmae)eul ttal geos-ila maengsehadeola
geuleona geudeul-eun ye-oeleul duji anh-assnola
geulihayeo geudeul-i janeun sai geudae junim-eulobuteoui jaeang-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul maemdol-assnola
geulihayeo geugeos(jeong-won)eun chilheug-ui bamgwa gat-i doeeossnola
geuleohge geudeul-eun achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae seologa seololeul buleudeola
‘geudaedeul-i (yeolmaeleul) ttalyeo handamyeon geudaedeul-ui gyeongjagjilo achim iljjig tteonasio’
geulihayeo geudeul-eun bimilseule iyagihamyeo chulbalhayeossnola
‘oneul-eun eotteon bul-uhan jado geudaedeul-ege deul-eoomyeon jeoldaelo an doeo’
geudeul-eun jeojie gwanhan gud-eun gyeolsim-eul jinin chae achim iljjig tteonassnola
geulihayeo geudeul-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul boass-eul ttae malhagil “jinsillo ulineun gil-eul jalmos deul-eossnola”
“geuleohji anhnola. ulineun jeji bad-eun jadeul-ila”
geudeul jung-ui gajang baleun jaga malhagil “naega geudaedeul-ege (hananim-eul) chan-yanghaeya handago malhaji anh-assneunga?”
geudeul-i malhagil “jeohuiui junim-eun wanbyeoghasin bun-imyeo sillo jeohuineun budanghan jadeul-ieossseubnida”
geudeul-eun seologa seololeul balabomyeo sangdaeleul wonmanghadeola
geudeul-i malhagil “jaeang-idoda! sillo ulineun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseon jadeul-ieossseubnida”
“uliui junimkkeseo uliege geuboda deo joh-eun geos-eulo daechehae jusigil balabnida. sillo ulineun uliui junimkke somanghal ppun-ibnida”
beol-ilan jeoleohadoda. geuleona geudeul-i algo issdamyeon sillo naese-ui beol-eun deo keunola
sillo hananim-eul gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geudeul junimkke gakkaun gos-eseo gippeum-ui cheongug-eul gajil geos-ila
geuleondedo naega, sunjonghaneun jadeul-eul aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeulgwa gat-i dundan mal-inga
geudaedeul-ege museun il-i il-eonan geos-inga? geudaedeul-eun eotteohge pangyeolhaneun geos-inga
animyeon geugeos(pangyeol)eul wihayeo geudaedeul-i ilgneun chaeg-ilado issdan mal-inga
sillo geudaedeul-eun goleuneun daelo gajil geos-ilaneun mal-i geu(chaeg) an-e issneun geos-inga
animyeon geudaedeul-i buhwal-ui nalkkaji jisogdoeneun, naega chaeg-imjil maengseleul gajigo iss-eo sillo geudaedeul-eun pangyeolhaneun daelo gajindan mal-inga
geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudeul-ege geudeul jung-ui nuga geugeos-eul bojeunghal geos-inji mul-eobola
animyeon geudeul-ege (hananimgwa) daedeunghan jonjaedeul-i issdan mal-inga? geuleohdamyeon, geudeul-i jinsildoen jadeul-ilamyeon geudeul-i malhaneun daedeunghan jonjaedeul-eul gajyeowa bodolog hala
geunal jeong-gang-iga nochuldoego geudeul-eun buboghal geos-eul yogubad-euna (geuleohge) hajileul moshadeola

geudeul-ui nun-eun tteolgueojil geos-imyeo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul deopchil geos-ila. geudeul-eun imi (hyeonse-ui) anjeonhan sangtaeeseo buboghal geos-eul yogubad-ass-euna geudeul-eun midongdo anh-assnola
geuleoni geudae(muhammadeu)neun nawa, i malsseum-eul bujeonghaneun jaleul noh-a dula. naneun geudeul-i alji moshaneun gos-eseo geudeul-eul seoseohi ogjoel geos-ila
naneun geudeul-eul bolyuhal geos-ini sillo naui gyelyag-eun ganglyeoghanola
geudae(muhammadeu)ga geudeul-ege bosulado yoguhaneun geos-inga? geuleohdamyeon geudeul-eun bij-eulo malmiam-a heoliga hwige doel geos-ila
animyeon geudeul-ege, boiji anhneun yeong-yeog(e daehan jisig)ilado iss-eo geudeul-i (geugeos-eul) giloghaneun geos-inga
geuleoni geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudae junim-ui pangyeol-e innaehago mulgogiui donglyo(yona)cheoleom doeji malla : geuneun sileum-e jamgin chae (hananim-eul) bulleossnola
geuui junim-ui eunchong-i geuege dadaleuji anh-assdeolamyeon sillo geuneun binanbad-eumyeo beolpan-e naedeonjyeojyeoss-eul geos-ila
geulihayeo geuui junim-eun geuleul seontaeghasieo seonlyanghan jadeul jung-ui hanalo dusyeossnola
bulsinhan jadeul-eun kkulan-eul deul-eoss-eul ttae sillo geudeul-ui nun-eulosseo geudae(muhammadeu)leul geoui neom-eotteulilyeo hamyeonseo “geuneun jinsillo michin jala” go malhadeola
geuleona geugeos(kkulan)eun jonjaehaneun modeun geos-eul wihan mesijie daleum anila
